column1: #text=I needed to read a book for my history class , so I decided to see if the local library had a copy .
#text=I went to the library 's website and searched for the book .
#text=I saw that they had it in stock , so I walked to the library .
#text=When I entered the library , I walked over to the front desk and told the librarian the name of the book I was looking for .
#text=He showed me where the book was and asked me if I 'd like to look for anything else .
#text=I said that would be all , so he took the book over to the front desk , and I followed .
#text=At the desk , he scanned the book and asked me if I had a library card .
#text=I said I did and showed him .
#text=He then scanned my card , handed me the book , and told me it would be due back in two weeks .
